summary: Two best friends, Liana and Alexa, embark on a journey to find the Diamond Castle! With the help of music, the girls overcome challenges that show friendship is the true treasure.
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Melissa Lyons|Cassidy Ladden|Chantal Strand|Maryke Hendrikse|Lara Janine|Kathleen Barr|Mark Acheson|Scott McNeil|Jeremy From|Noel Johansen|Nicole Oliver|Heather Doerksen|Michael Dobson|Ron Halder|Linda Sorensen|Veena Sood
title: Barbie y el castillo de diamantes
